tagline.title: BALI ELEPHANT RIDE AND SPA TOUR PACKAGES IS COMBINATION BETWEEN RIDING AN ELEPHANTS FOR 30 MINUTES AND THEN CONTINUE TO RELAX WITH 2 HOURS SPA PACKAGES

description.text: Bali Elephant Ride and Spa Tour is an Bali Double Activities Tour Packages we created to make your holiday more impressive by doing riding an elephants for 30 minutes and then enjoy the 2 hours spa packages we offer. Is amazing memory you will have by take this packages, First we will heading directly to the Elephant parks after pick up you at hotel, at the parks you will enjoy riding the biggest and amazing animal with 30 minutes duration passed the jungle, bus and local village, is rare experience by see the view from the top of the elphants on a teak chair. After finish riding an elephants you will enjoy our delicious lunch Indonesian food. After finish the lunch, our driver will escort you to thr Spa provider to refrehs your mind and bocy for 2 hours, after the treatmants you will feel refresh and ready to face a new challenge. This Bali Elephant Ride Tour will be more enjoyable with our professional Bali Tour Driver by offer outstanding services to make you more enjoyable in the trip and the activities.

title.title: Bali Elephant Ride Tour | Bali Elephant Ride and Spa Tour Packages

image.title: Bali Elephant Ride Tour | Bali Elephant Ride and Spa Tour Packages | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Elephant Ride Tour is some great adventure to riding an Elephant in Bali islands, This journey will give amazing experience to sit on teak chair on the top of the elphant and see the beautiful panoraman view surrounds the parks. The elphant parks we will visit is the Bakas Elephant Park in Klungkung regency, in here you will riding an elephant or 30 minutes ride and will assist by professional Elephant Tour Guide. You will go along green bushes and side of river. During the Elephant Trip you will also see beautiful green hill and sometimes appearance of monkey's.
description.html: Bali Elephant Ride Tour is some great adventure to riding an Elephant in Bali islands, This journey will give amazing experience to sit on teak chair on the top of the elphant and see the beautiful panoraman view surrounds the parks. title.title: Bali Spa Packages | Bali Elephant Ride and Spa Tour Packages

image.title: Bali Spa Packages | Bali Elephant Ride and Spa Tour Packages | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Spa Tour Packages we offer is the best spa treatmants to make your day like new again, The treatmants with professional theraphist which already known the best spot and strong pressure to make your body and mind refresh. The 2 hours spa tour pacakges we offer consist of 1 hours balinese massage and 1 hours spa treatmants. The Balinese believe that the body, mind and spirit work in harmony. The health and well being of all make the whole happy. Enjoy this delightful blend of massage techniques: traditional Balinese massage, reflexology, face and hand massage.

price.title: Bali Elephant Ride and Spa Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Elephant Ride and Spa Tour Price :

  • 1 Person : IDR 1,800,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 1,500,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 1,350,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 1,300,000/person
  • 5 Person or More : IDR 1,250,000/person

Note :

  • Get special price for group booking

Bali Elephant Ride and Spa Tour Price Included :

  • Private Car with Clean, Comfortable and Good A/C condition
  • Mineral Water
  • Safety and Well Maintenance Equipment's
  • 30 Minutes Elephant Ride
  • 2 Hours Spa packages (1 Hours Balinese Massage + 1 Hours Spa)
  • Professional Elephant Guide and Spa Theraphist
  • Lunch Indonesian Food
  • Insurance Coverage

itinerary.title: Bali Elephant Ride and Spa Tour Itinerary :

content.event: Elephant Ride finish and enjoy lunch
Lunch finish and continue the tour
Spa finish and Back to hotel

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.
